root.name: Kikstart 2
root.description: Kikstart 2 was based on the TV show of the same name and sent one or two players ( split screen) onto one of two dozen racetracks including with the game. The game is a side-scroller and the players have to overcome all sorts of obstacles, most of which include careful and planned jumps. On top of the included race tracks, the game came with a powerful course designer that let the players create their own tracks and challenge each other once more.
